scenario.name: uas_script
scenario.send:
SIP/2.0 200 OK [last_Via:] [last_From:] [last_To:];tag=[$local_tag] [last_Call-ID:] [last_CSeq:] Contact: <sip:[$number]@[local_ip]:[local_port];user=phone> Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=student 123456 654321 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=A conversation c=IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [auto_media_port] RTP/AVP 8 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000 a=rtpmap:101 telephone-event/8000 a=fmtp:101 0-11,16

BYE sip:[$uac_number]@[$new_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:[$uas_number]@pv.ssw2>;tag=[$local_tag] To: <sip:[$uac_number]@pv.ssw2>;[$remote_tag] [last_Call-ID:] CSeq: [cseq] BYE Contact: sip:[$uas_number]@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Length: 0

INVITE sip:[$drop_acw]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:[service]@[$local_domain]>;tag=[$local_tag]complite To: "[$uas_number]" <sip:[$drop_acw]@[$local_domain]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] INVITE Contact: <sip:[service]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Allow: INVITE, ACK, CANCEL, OPTIONS, BYE, REFER, NOTIFY, MESSAGE, SUBSCRIBE, INFO Subject: Performance Test Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=student 123456 654321 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=A conversation c=IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [auto_media_port] RTP/AVP 8 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000 a=rtpmap:101 telephone-event/8000 a=fmtp:101 0-11,16

ACK sip:[$drop_acw]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] [last_from:] [last_to:] [last_call-id:] CSeq: [$last_cseq] ACK Contact: <sip:[service]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Content-Length: 0

ACK sip:[$drop_acw]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[$last_branch] [last_from:] [last_to:] [last_call-id:] CSeq: [$last_cseq] ACK Contact: <sip:[service]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Content-Length: 0

INVITE sip:[$drop_acw]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:[service]@[$local_domain]>;tag=[$local_tag]complite To: "[$uas_number]" <sip:[$drop_acw]@[$local_domain]> [last_call-id] CSeq: [cseq] INVITE Contact: <sip:[service]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> [authentication] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=student 123456 654321 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=A conversation c=IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [auto_media_port] RTP/AVP 8 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000 a=rtpmap:101 telephone-event/8000 a=fmtp:101 0-11,16
